chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has a problem.
The rear camera doesn't autofocus when the subject is more than 1 meter away. I have to get very close to make it focus and then, when I try to force the camera to autofocus by tapping on the subject, the camera makes a grinding noise.

Thank you for your help,

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair, the 24/05/2024. The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 30/05/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,

Heritinasoa-Fenitriniaina from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We have received the device. We will proceed with the necessary actions soon. In the meantime, please do NOT refund the customer.

Regards,
JY
